1.4

  • ownCloud News support Features  
  • sync more responsive BugFixes  
  • app fully operational during initial sync  
  • overlay to indicate new articles  
  • dynamic switch between GMenu in gnome and menu-button elsewhere  
  • notifications are updated rather than creating new ones every time  
  • respect notification settings of the DE  
  • better font-styling on non-elementary distributions BugFixes  
  • proper fullscreen mode for videos  
  • support multiple share accounts of the same kind (e.g. two different pocket accounts) Features  
  • fixed memory leaks BugFixes  
  • option to ignore unknown CAs  
  • updated GrabberConfig files to upstream from fivefilters

  • basic full text search Features  
  • support feeds without category (feedly) Features  
  • support feeds with multiple categories (feedly) Features
